meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6432.

td.p: Arjun Malhotra, a 12-year-old from Sammamish, Washington
Injee Hong, a 12-year-old from Metairie, Louisiana
Ryan Griffin, an 11-year-old from Waldwick, New Jersey

tr.td: HIDING PLACES
SUPER BOWL WINNERS
NAME THAT CONTINENT
THE PLANETS
HODGEPODGE
GETTING DRESSED

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_6_4', 'clue_J_6_4_stuck', '(Arjun: What is a turtle?)
(Alex: Right. No! Sorry.) [no one else rings in]
(Alex: It\'s a mock turtleneck, not just turtle. [looking at the judges\' table] Although we\'ll be checking on that one, I think.)
[the ruling was later reversed to give Arjun credit for turtle.]

a turtle(neck)

Arjun
')

td.a: THE WIZARDING WORLD OF HARRY POTTER
